name: <[ascii::ascii_char::AsciiChar]>::as_bytes

<[ascii::ascii_char::AsciiChar]>::as_str.doc: Views this slice of ASCII characters as a UTF-8 `str`.

str::<impl str>::as_bytes.doc:
Converts a string slice to a byte slice. To convert the byte slice back
 into a string slice, use the [`from_utf8`] function.

 # Examples

 ```
 let bytes = "bors".as_bytes();
 assert_eq!(b"bors", bytes);
 ```

doc: Views this slice of ASCII characters as a slice of `u8` bytes.
